title: Jittery Borderline Cruise
author: Penguins 3rd Leg
citation: Penguins 3rd Leg. "Jittery Borderline Cruise: experience with Coleus (ID 34016)". Erowid.org. Nov 30, 2007. erowid.org/exp/34016
footer: Age at time of experience: Not Given

[ View as PDF (for printing) ] [ View as LaTeX (for geeks) ]
[ Switch Colors ]
report:
Smoked 4 pipes of fresh leaf, and one pipe of flowers/seeds. 5+minutes - feeling something, nervous jittery, the curtain is moving upward slowly and doging from side to side ever so slightly. Doubt this is a 'placebo' effect.
10+minutes - I feel a bit stoned, my fingers have slight, jittery trails as I am typing.
15+minutes - monitors refresh rate more noticable, appreciable connection to geometric/psychedelic patterns, pupils constricted
p.s I am going to try some more, intruiging to say the least.
- 5/30/2004
